name: Friday Night Funkin' For ios/Android
description:
Controls (In Menus):  Navigate Up = Swipe Down Navigate Down = Swipe Up Change Difficulty = Swipe Right Go Back = Swipe Left Enter/Select = Tap Controls (In Game):   Supported Browsers (Latest Version):  Safari Chrome.

https://fnfmodattempt.weebly.com/ 

Known Issues:

  • Restarting songs might reload your page
  • Possible stuttering and hitches
  • Potential fix is to restart that level
  • Sprites might not work on really old devices
  • May crash for no reason at any given time
  • Accuracy bar still not accurate
  • Other glitches with Kade Engine

New Update (LOL)
